show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #60 Matt Kleopfer "Build your Ark"
subtitle: #60 Matt Kleopfer "Build your Ark"
summary:
This week my friend Matt joins me to talk about some things that we can do to gather our tribes and protect our communities.
Resources mentioned:

Curtis Stone's Fromthefield.tv

J M Fortier's Market Gardener Institute

Four Season Farm 

Ray Tyler's Rose Creek Farm 

Weston A Price Foundation 

Weston Price's Podcast
